org.grouplens.lenskit.indexes

Class MutableIdIndexMapping

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.indexes.IdIndexMapping
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.indexes.MutableIdIndexMapping
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class MutableIdIndexMapping
extends IdIndexMapping
    Mutable index mapping. Use this when you need to have indexes before you've seen all the IDs.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      MutableIdIndexMapping()
      Construct a new empty indexer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MutableIdIndexMapping

        public MutableIdIndexMapping()
        Construct a new empty indexer. The first interned ID will have index 0.

      • getId

        public long getId(int idx)
        Description copied from class: IdIndexMapping
        Get the ID for an index.
        Specified by:
        getId in class IdIndexMapping
        Parameters:
        idx - The index of the ID to retrieve.
        Returns:

      • getIdList

        public LongList getIdList()
        Description copied from class: IdIndexMapping
        Get the list of indexed IDs.
        Specified by:
        getIdList in class IdIndexMapping
        Returns:
        The list of IDs in the index. No ID will appear twice.

      • tryGetIndex

        public int tryGetIndex(long id)
        Description copied from class: IdIndexMapping
        Try to get the index for an ID, returning a negative value if it does not exist. This method is like IdIndexMapping.getIndex(long), except it returns a negative value instead of throwing an exception if the id does not exist.
        Specified by:
        tryGetIndex in class IdIndexMapping
        Parameters:
        id - The ID to look for.
        Returns:
        The index of the ID, or a negative value if it is not in the index.

      • size

        public int size()
        Description copied from class: IdIndexMapping
        Get the size of this index.
        Specified by:
        size in class IdIndexMapping
        Returns:
        The number of indexed IDs.

      • internId

        public int internId(long id)
        Get an index for an ID, generating a new one if necessary.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID.
        Returns:
        The index for id. If the ID has already been added to the index, the old index is returned; otherwise, a new index is generated and returned.

      • immutableCopy

        public IdIndexMapping immutableCopy()
        Make an immutable copy of this index mapping.
        Returns:
        An immutable copy of the index mapping.
